short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CoPilot™ Extensions For Chrome. CoPilot™ New AI and Open SideBar in Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CoPilot™ Extensions For Chrome. CoPilot™ New AI and Open SideBar in Chrome

Microsoft Copilot sidebar ported from Edge to Chrome

Microsoft Copilot is now available in the Chrome browser and can be opened as a sidebar with a single click at any time. Then you can ask any questions you want and get answers quickly.
